mapper.select: select * from t_menu where delete_flag = 0 order by update_time desc

SELECT t.* FROM ( SELECT m.* FROM t_role_menu rm LEFT JOIN t_menu m ON m.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN t_role r ON r.id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN t_user u ON u.staff_id = ur.staff_id WHERE u.staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND m.plat_form = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT m.* FROM t_menu m WHERE m.id IN ( SELECT m.parent_id FROM t_role_menu rm LEFT JOIN t_menu m ON m.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN t_role r ON r.id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN t_user u ON u.staff_id = ur.staff_id WHERE u.staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND m.plat_form = 1 ) ) t ORDER BY t.sort
select m.* from t_role_menu rm inner join t_role r on rm.role_id=r.id inner join t_menu m on rm.menu_id=m.id where m.delete_flag = 0 and rm.role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by m.sort
